normalized: it was the morning of the third day, since i had planted the bug in cara.

name: cara
normalized: good morning, everyone.
cara seemed to be her usual self, as she came to the dining hall.
even though she had a slightly bewitching smile on her flushed face, she was carrying herself majestically while exuding her refined elegance as usual.
actually, no.
there was one thing that she was lacking.

name: cara
normalized: hey, kitae… don't you know something about marika?

name: kitae
normalized: forgive me, cara.
i was planning to tell you yesterday itself, however, i was so sick that i had to leave abruptly, even though we were in the middle of our talk.
she was referring to the time when the both of them had had a meeting, before she had come to me.

name: kitae
normalized: i requested marika to attend to some negotiations-related matter.
she should be back in about five days.
the queen became silent while looking at the barrier-master, as if she had become distracted by something.

name: kitae
normalized: i was considering getting your approval for the same, however, it was quite urgent.

name: azuma
normalized: i wish i could have gone in her stead, however, i had to go out to meet up with some people in order to gather information concerning the missing student.

name: cara
normalized: it is alright.
you should work diligently for the sake of that child.

name: kitae
normalized: just because you have been liberated from her watch doesn't mean that you should spread your wings too much though.

name: cara
normalized: oh?
i might say that there is still an annoying watch on me over here.
cara and kitae started chatting frivolously.
you are going to realize that marika is dead, only after you have been transformed into my puppet.
i can't wait to see just what kind of an expression you will have on your face at the time.

name: azuma
normalized: miss queen, let's have food together.
the queen carried her breakfast to the table, after being invited to do so by azuma and kitae.

name: kitae
normalized: say… don't you… have a little less to eat there?

name: cara
normalized: i am going on a diet.

name: kitae
normalized: that word… is anathema to us.

name: azuma
normalized: i am a stranger to diets.

name: kitae
normalized: indeed.
even as a young child…
kitae raised her face, before looking at her old friend with a serious expression on her face.

name: kitae
normalized: you have to eat properly, especially as you don't drink blood, don't you?

name: cara
normalized: fufufu… thank you.
however, you need not worry about me.
the queen ate it even more slowly than usual.
were the effects of the bug and the aphrodisiac making it difficult for her to swallow it down her throat?
i sneered at her within my heart.
